title: After the harvest
creator_contributor_role: Victorian College of Agriculture and Horticulture, production company
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Plant products
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Consumer satisfaction
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Farm produce - Australia
description: Episode number 13 of Series "Growing awareness: Factors in plant production". Overviews the marketing of horticultural products in both domestic and international markets with basic marketing principles being applied to specialised products from the commercial garden. Topics discussed: understanding the market, buyer behaviour, packaging, storage, the impact of chemical use, pricing, competition, market research and an analysis of the technological developments which ensure a product is delivered in a marketable condition.
